title: [Health] Scientists have shown for the first time a link between chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), an often fatal lung condition, and the gut microbiome. They found the gut microbiome could now be considered when looking for new therapeutic targets to help treat lung disease
[Health] A 42% LDL-C reduction and 14 mmHg systolic blood pressure reduction was achieved in patients who completed a remotely delivered cardiovascular risk-management program
